issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: FileSinkOperator/Compactor doesn't create empty files for acid path

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
status.name: In Progress

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Remove special handling for Acid tables wherever possible

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
don't think we have such tests for Acid path
check if they exist for non-acid path

way to record expected files on disk in ptest/qfile
https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/ql/src/test/queries/clientpositive/orc_merge3.q#L25
dfs -ls ${hiveconf:hive.metastore.warehouse.dir}/orcfile_merge3b/;

no related failures for HIVE-16077.08.patch
[~prasanth_j] could you review please
+1. Looks good to me. Only comment is the one you had already mentioned in the patch related to closing on abort. Will be good to add that too.

patch 8 committed to master (3.0)
thanks Prasanth for the review
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
